content.text:
HON. SAM GRAVES

                              of missouri

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 14, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. GRAVES of Missouri. Mr. Speaker, on November 13, 2017 I missed a 
series of Roll Call votes. Had I been present, I would have voted 
``YEA'' on Nos. 623 and 624. I would have voted ``NAY'' on No. 625.
content.speaker: Mr. GRAVES of Missouri
